data.title: Life’s Work: Ricky Gervais
data.meta_description: Listen to the interview this article is based on.Download this podcast Ricky Gervais was 40 years old when his British television mock-documentary The Office became a hit, in 2001. The former student-union events manager has gone on to write, produce, direct, and perform in another hit show, Extras; several Hollywood films; four sellout comedy tours; […]
